tree.name: Tobias Harris
tree.note: Forward from Tennessee, signed 2-year, $52 million contract, second stint with Detroit

tradeChain.name: Tobias Harris
tradeChain.tradeDescription: Bucks traded Stephen Jackson and future pick to Bobcats for Tobias Harris draft rights
tradeChain.note: Forward from Tennessee, drafted 19th overall by Charlotte, traded to Milwaukee on draft night
